title: Training Development Specialist
summary: Apple’s Strategic Data Solutions (SDS) team is looking for a Training Development Specialist who has passion for helping individuals become the best version of themselves.
description: As a Training Development Specialist in SDS, you will help give people the knowledge and tools necessary to be their very best every day. You will help cultivate a collaborative and productive learning environment that encourages and empowers both individuals and teams to challenge, experiment, and grow.
key_qualifications:
-  High level of ethics and personal values
-  Experience in coaching, training, and/or teaching
-  Understanding of instructional design models, processes, and learning theories
-  Understanding of adult learning concepts and techniques
-  Clear and effective curriculum-planning skills
-  Excellent presentation, facilitation, and delivery skills
-  Excellent planning, organization, and implementation skills
-  Experience in managing international collaborations, especially virtually
-  Experience in interacting with and influencing all levels of leadership
-  Ability to work independently, flexible schedules
-  Ability to navigate learning management systems
-  Proficiency in course development software
-  Strong project management skills
-  Critical and systems thinking skills
-  Comfort with ambiguity and embracing change
education_experience: Bachelor's degree or equivalent plus a minimum of 5+ years of training/coaching/teaching experience. A degree or equivalent experience in instructional design, education, coaching, or a related field is a plus.
additional_requirements:
-  Familiarity with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Dreamweaver
-  Basic understanding of HTML and Flash
